Organics/ Megatron Revived:
 
"We'll find out when he finds out," Organics said,"but right now, leave him alone."
 
Megatron Revived looked deep into the cockpit of the shuttle to see who or what was inside.  
"Are you alright in there?" he shouted.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Ydrassil:

"Your Step-brother????"Ydrassil was surpriced and said "What will 
say Rodimus if he knew this???"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> "But he is also my step brother!  I won't lose him again!"
> Organics drew her rifle and took aim on Ydrassil.
> "Leave him alone." the femme said, tears rushing down her face.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> YDrassil:
> 
> "ORGANICS!!! I DONM'T KNOW HOW BUT IT'S MEGATRON OR SWORN 
> ENEMY!!!!"yelled Ydrassil while he tried to find a way to shot him 
> without hurt her
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Organics/ Megatron Revived:
> >  
> > It took several seconds for it to register.  Megatron was back!  
> Her step brother was revived!  She saw Yddrassil open fire.
> > "NO!  DON'T SHOOT!" the femme yelled as she flew to him and 
tried 
> to obstruct his line of fire.
> >  
> > Megatron Revived was busy pushing against the shuttle when he 
was 
> struck in the back.  He glared down over his shoulder, and saw two 
> smaller robots below.  One was his step sister Organics, and she 
was 
> trying to keep the other from firing on him.  He turned his 
> attention back to the shuttle and opened his engines all the way, 
> this shuttle was going to stop now.
> 
>
